how do i put this on my ps3? i've got all the ziped files but i don't know how to put it on my ps3 and where...(this is my first hacked game so yeah i'm new to this and i hope you will be able to help me cause this game is awsome!)
unzip the first .rar file with winrar, then you transfer the map to your ps3 with ftp, install blackbox ftp on your ps3 and either filezilla or smartftp on your pc.
